title: Simple French bread
ingredients: ['Yeast Sponge', '1/2 teaspoon dried fast acting yeast', '125ml warm water (45 degrees C)', '95g wholemeal flour', 'Dough', '600ml warm water', '1/2 teaspoon dried fast acting yeast', '825g white bread flour', '1 tablespoon sea salt', '2 tablespoons fine polenta or cornmeal for dusting']
